Using more of the [[Ryūmyaku]] [[chakra]], Mukade shoots a larger, more powerful version of the Ryūmyaku: Great Dragon Fire from his [[puppet]] body's stomach. He states that this is his greatest technique. Unlike its lesser version, this technique doesn't simply burn targets but instead causes a massive explosion that can create a crater in the ground, and it does not leave any residual purple flames.
